name: G-Max Smite
effect: The Fairy-type user can choose to use this instead of Max Starfall while Dynamaxed. Mutually exclusive with other G-Max moves. Deals the base move's damage + 2 to a single enemy. Apply confusion to all foes.
description: The foe conjures some giant stars that fall from the sky, exploding all around the foe and confusing the opponents.
